name: X-cosrack Drafting Table with Storage Shelves & Drawer, 43" Adjustable Art Desk with Monitor Stand for Home Office Computer, Tiltable Draft Drawing Table for Artist, Study, Writing Workstation

【WHAT YOU GET】X-cosrack classic computer desk, with durable, rust-proof, sturdy metal frame and High-grade MDF wood,Cross structure and adjustable feet design ensure the desk strong stability; no worry of wobble. name: MEEDEN Vintage Wooden Drafting Table: 35.5" x 23.5'' Artist Drawing Table with Adjustable Height & Tilting Tabletop - Studio Painting Craft Desk for Writing Reading Sketching
short_description: SUPERB QUALITY: Vintage Walnut-colored drafting tabletop is hand made of smooth particle board, excellent craftsmanship is not easy to be damaged or cracked with a long service life. H-frame construction makes the art table stable and durable, thickened beechwood table legs with strong support and high load-bearing. Clear wood grain makes the table more texture and build-in pencil ledge prevents painting tools from falling.

MULTI-DIRECTIONAL ADJUSTMENT: The height of the drafting table can be adjusted from 32.5'' to 37.5'', provide you 6 height options with 1-1/5'' of each height division.The tabletop can be tilted from a flat to 65°, you can freely adjust 7 angles according to your needs. It is very convenient to adjust to any position. 24'' T-square ruler with clear scale and inch & metric calibrations.

UPGARDED CRAFTSMANSHIP: Vintage design in the semicircle iron sheet giving the table industrial style and the new mould design of threaded hole maximum reduced the shaking of tabletop. With durable and exquisite hardware accessories,it has advantages in both the functionality and appearance.

WIDE RANGE OF USAGE: It can be used for painting, writing, reading,studying architectural drawing, and used as an art workbench, student desk, computer desk,craft desk etc, suitable for students and adults. Matching with dark furniture makes your decoration style more noble and elegant.

MEEDEN for ULTIMATE SATISFACTION: MEEDEN is more like a family with hundreds of members wholly dedicated to helping you succeed in your artistic endeavors through high-quality, unique art supplies. And like a family, we stick together, and if anything goes south, you can always rely on MEEDEN, through thick and thin - give us a little sign - a mail, a call, or a message.

name: SUPER DEAL Drafting Table Set with Charging Station, Height Adjustable Tilting Drawing Desk Artist Desk with Stool Multifunctional Art Craft Workstation with 2 Storage Drawers for Home Office School
short_description: Adjustable Desk Surface to Meet Diverse Needs -- The height adjustable drawing table measures (44.6-54.1)"L x 23.6"W x (27.2-37)"H in overall dimensions. The big tabletop angle can be adjusted between 0 and 45 degrees, making it easy to handle different types of painting, such as sketching, watercolor, and oil painting. This design greatly enhances the practicality and flexibility of the drawing desk.

Built-in Outlets for Convenient Power Access -- A power outlet is provided on one side of the desk - it can be installed on the left or right side as you like, allowing for easy connection to power sources or other electronic devices without worrying about tangled wires. This design allows creators to focus more on their work during the painting process, improving work efficiency.

Compact while Versatile Storage Solutions -- There is a slideable side-board that can be pushed in if it isn't needed, extending the desk by another 17 inches. Storage on the right side is a pivoting wire mesh cup and a number of plastic cutouts for pretty much any hobby. Two drawers underneath add more storage space, convenient for storing brushes, paints, paper, and other painting tools, keeping the work surface tidy and organized, and ensuring inspiration isn't disturbed by clutter.

Integrated Design with a Dtrong Dodern Feel -- With a minimalist yet elegant design that blends into modern home decor, it is not only an ideal choice for painting work but also enhances the artistic atmosphere of a home or studio. Multiple colors and styles are available to match different personalities and environments.

Stable Support, Safe and Durable -- The desk is supported by a black metal frame with rubber leg covers that not only has a simple and elegant appearance but also exhibits excellent load-bearing capacity and stability. Even when placing large drawing boards or painting tools, the desk surface remains stable and does not wobble, allowing creators to work more peacefully. The stool's legs are thickened for added stability, ensuring safe use without worry.

name: FLEXISPOT Electric Drafting Table Adjustable Height 47.2"x23.6" Standing Drawing Desk Extendable Top Craft Workstation w/Tilting Tabletop, Storage Drawer for Study, Office, Studio, Art, Adult & Kid
short_description: EFFORTLESS HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT: Experience seamless height adjustment (1.0 inch/s) with our powerful motor, reducing strain on your neck, back, and waist. 4 Preset levels for all family members!

TILTING TABLETOP (0-40°): Infinite angle control for seamless transitions between laptop work, reading, and drawing. Adjust to 0-10° for comfortable writing, 10-20° for optimal reading, and 20-40° for precise artistic creations.

COLLAPSIBLE SIDE TABLE & DRAWER: Our craft table features a space-saving table top that folds away when not in use. It provides extra workspace, perfect for small spaces. The craft table with storage drawer keeps your stationery organized.

ALL-IN-ONE VERSATILITY: Designed for artists, students, and professionals, our draft desk adapts to a variety of tasks and art supplies. From writing and reading to drawing, crafting and painting, this craft desk is to unleash your creativity.
Easy Assembly: The package includes a height-adjustable desk, an instruction manual, and the tools necessary for assembly. The clear manual allows you to assemble the various parts together easily.

name: Yaheetech Height Adjustable Drafting Table Drawing Table Artist Desk Tilting Tabletop Art Craft Desk Watercolor Paintings Sketching Work Station w/2 Storage Drawers and Stool for Home Office
short_description: Adjustable Table Height: The height adjustable drawing table measures 47.4x23.6x(27.4-36.4)” (LxWxH) in overall dimensions. Rest assured that all the fittings applies (e.g. metal connectors, plastic knobs and more) work well to ease your every single adjustment.

Easy Angle Control: The artist table can be tilted at an angle range of 0-60°. It can work as a regular flat table for your laptop tasks or a professional drafting table for your art interests. The 100% tested adjustment system makes it easy for you to control the angle at your will.

Durable Pencil Ledge: The drawing board has an adjustable metal pencil ledge attached to the front edge to keep your drawing instruments from sliding/rolling off at a tilted angle. A special adjustment fitting design for you to lock and loose the pencil ledge with ease.

A space-saving retractable board for documents/files. 2 simple yet practical nonwoven fabric drawers for mobile devices. An extra metal shelf down below for drawing drafts/paint cans.

Table/Stool Set: This drafting table set includes a stool in the package, which features a sturdy construction of a well finished metal frame and color/style matching black PU-wrapped sponge padding round seat. Now enjoy the added comfort!

name: MoNiBloom Drafting Table on Wheels with Storage & Side Tray - Adjustable 0-65° Glass Tabletop, Replaceable Feet Art Desk
short_description: Toughened Glass Desktop - This toughened glass desktop is a durable and strong portable drafting table, art desk, drawing table or artist desk. It features filleted edges and rounded corners to prevent undesired injury or damage during moving and using. It can combine with a light to turn this drafting table into a light table, making it great for tracing and comic creation.

Adjustable Desktop Angle - The angle of the glass desktop of this adjustable drawing table can be adjusted from 0 to 65° to meet your different needs. A pencil ledge on the bottom of the tabletop helps hold papers and stationery when the desktop is tilted. It is versatile and can be used as a computer table or writing table for drawing or working.

Large Storage Space - This art table has 4 embedded stationery trays on both sides that can be freely arranged, several honeycomb pen holes and slots in different sizes on the trays help organize stationery and tools. Moreover, two layers of non-woven cloth drawers on the right can be pulled out silently, providing ample storage space.

More Stable - This drafting table has a steel tube frame structure with reinforced bottom frame and T-shaped legs, providing optimal stability and durability. The table remains stable and secure, providing a safe and reliable workspace for creative projects.

Versatile Art Desk - Not only does this drafting table work as an art drawing desk, diamond painting desk but also as a normal computer table or writing table. It is perfect for art, drafting, and creative tasks in the office, studio, or at home.

4 Swivel Casters + 4 Rubber Feet - This portable drafting table comes with 4 360° swivel casters for flexible mobility, 2 with brakes for easy locking of the table in position. The other 4 rubber feet will prevent it from destroying the floor, especially on wooden floors.

Easy to Clean - No more worries about spilled paint, coffee or pen marks as the tempered glass top and waterproof powder-coated metal stand of this drawing desk can be easily cleaned with a damp cloth and mild cleanser.
